titleStmt.title: The Kingis Maiesties proclamatioun beiring the verie occasioun of the present incu[m]ming of the Inglis forces with his heines commandement for thair gude intreatment and freindly vsage.
Proclamations, 1573-04-13
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1567-1625 : James VI)

notesStmt.note: Dated: "the xiii. day of Apryle, and of our regne the sext zeir. 1573".
This edition has "Imprentit" in the last line.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio Regis.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
